entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:41 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Ice pellets early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
